title: Democratic Rep.: Twenty Years After Katrina, This Administration Is Repeating FEMA's Deadliest Mistakes | Opinion
description: President Donald Trump has repeatedly said that he wants to eliminate FEMA altogether and shift full responsibility for disaster response to the states.
content: Twenty years ago this week, Hurricane Katrina ripped through our Gulf Coast, showing not only the fury of nature, but serious flaws in our federal disaster response system. The failure that followed—… [+5586 chars]
